attributes.action: We want an early election and for rishi sunak to resign!! We the have had enough
attributes.additional_details: We are tired of the government targeting the poor elderly and most vulnerable people in society and it’s time for change
attributes.background: We want Rishi Sunak out and new leader.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for elected representatives or public servants to resign or be removed from office. 

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that. 

You may wish to sign this open petition which calls for one of the actions you mention in your petition:

Call an immediate General Election - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/658173

You are more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.
